pub.devrel.easygoogle.gac

Interface SignIn.SignInListener

  • Enclosing class:
    SignIn

    public static interface SignIn.SignInListener
    Listener to be notified of asynchronous Sign In events, like sign in or sign out,

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSignedIn(Person person)
      The user has been signed successfully.
      void onSignedOut()
      The user has been signed out and access has been revoked.
      void onSignInFailed()
      The sign in process failed, either due to user cancellation or unresolvable errors.

    • Method Detail

      • onSignedIn

        void onSignedIn(Person person)
        The user has been signed successfully.
        Parameters:
        person - basic information abou the signed-in user like name and email.

      • onSignInFailed

        void onSignInFailed()
        The sign in process failed, either due to user cancellation or unresolvable errors. The app should display a sign-in button and wait for the user to initiate action before attempting sign-in again.

      • onSignedOut

        void onSignedOut()
        The user has been signed out and access has been revoked.
